text: The Volkswagen Golf Plus is a minivan made by Volkswagen its based on the Volkswagen Golf. ==First generation== The first generation of the Golf Plus were launched in 2005, and were based on the Volkswagen Golf Mk5. ===Models=== * 1.4: 16-valve naturally-aspirated petrol engine with multipoint injection and 55 kW (until 2006) or 59 kW (from 2007) * 1.6: 8-valve naturally-aspirated petrol engine with multipoint injection and 75 kW * 1.6 FSI: 16-valve naturally-aspirated petrol engine with direct injection and 85 kW * 2.0 FSI: 16-valve naturally-aspirated petrol engine with direct injection and 110 kW * 1.4 TSI: 16-valve turbocharged petrol engine with direct injection and 90 kW, 103 kW, 118 kW, or 125 kW * 1.9 TDI: 8-valve turbocharged diesel engine with or without particulate filter with 66 kW or 77 kW * 2.0 TDI: 16-valve turbocharged diesel engine without particulate filter with 100 kW or 103 kW * 2.0 TDI: 8-valve turbocharged diesel engine with particulate filter and 103 kW ==Second generation== The second generation of the Golf Plus were launched in 2009, and were based on the Volkswagen Golf Mk6. ===Models=== * 1.4: 16-valve naturally-aspirated petrol engine with multipoint injection and 59 kW * 1.6: 8-valve naturally-aspirated petrol engine with multipoint injection and 75 kW * 1.2 TSI: 8-valve turbocharged petrol engine with direct injection and 77 kW * 1.4 TSI: 16-valve turbocharged petrol engine with direct injection and 90 kW or 118 kW * 1.6 TDI: 16-valve turbocharged diesel engine with particulate filter and 66 kW or 77 kW * 2.0 TDI: 16-valve turbocharged diesel engine with particulate filter and 81 kW * 2.0 TDI: 16-valve turbocharged diesel engine with particulate filter and 103 kW Golf Plus Category:2000s automobiles Category:2010s automobiles Category:Minivans
title: Volkswagen Golf Plus
